snippet: Spence’s compositions were used to set the mood for NFL Films, and he was the last survivor of the four men credited with popularizing the football highlight genre.
abstract: Sam Spence, composer for NFL Films for over 30 years who helped popularize highlight reel through evocative musical scores, dies at age 88.
lead_paragraph: Spence’s compositions were used to set the mood for NFL Films, and he was the last survivor of the four men credited with popularizing the football highlight genre.

headline.main: Sam Spence, Who Set the Fierce Dance of the N.F.L. to Music in Film, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Sam Spence, Who Set the Fierce Dance of the N.F.L. to Music in Film, Dies at 88
